text:
Hi

I am currently using a response assertion to check the output of a JMS
Point-to-Point test. I have found that the patterns to test cannot contain
question marks. Here is an example:

Response Field to Test: Text Response
Pattern Matching Rules: Contains
Patterns to Test: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

Thanks,
Roger

P.S. I am using the nightly build 20050807
creator: roger.brudermann@winterthur.ch
sebb@apache.org
text:
Response Assertion uses Regular Expressions.
Question mark is an RE meta-character, and must be escaped to be used 
literally.

Try 

<\?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"\?>

instead.
